DOC.brief_title: Adherence Study Medication Compared Generic Topical Clindamycin Plus Generic Topical Tretinoin Subjects With Mild Moderate Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Males Females 12 year age old diagnosis mild moderate acne vulgaris . Subjects must sign write informed consent agree come study visit . Use experimental drug within 1 month prior initiation study therapy . Pregnant nursing female allow study , female childbearing potential pregnancy test baseline . Females childbearing potential must agree use approved birth control method duration study . Use systemic retinoids within 2 month enrollment , use topical retinoids , systemic antibiotic , nicotinamide , systemic steroid medication may confound result study within 1 month prior start study Use topical medication acne , include cosmetic contain retinol , within 2 week prior study entry . Any skin condition disease may require concurrent therapy may confound evaluation ; History hypersensitivity formulation component ; Facial skin cancer facial actinic keratosis ; Use photosensitize agent . Use isotretinoin within last 6 month . Chemical peel , microdermabrasion laser resurface within 3 month study entry . Crohns disease , ulcerative colitis , develop colitis past antibiotic use .
